description:
With the plan to evade the Loki Familia`s tight defenses still in motion, Gareth`s enters the battle resulting in Wiene being separated from Fels` group and chased by Tiona... Welf wields his magic swords and his life to stand against Gareth, but the difference in their abilities is clear. 
Meanwhile, Bell manages to shake Ais off his tail. He meets up with Haruhime, who has rushed out in fear of Wiene`s safety, and the two of them search for Wiene together.
Source: Crunchyroll
